overview_of_class: Evolution of the Earth's dynamic system and its record through geological time. Emphasis of the course is on the evolution of life as determined from the evidence of the fossil record.
name: Earth System History
title: WCAS EARTH 203-0-01 Earth System History

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Evolution of the Earth's dynamic system and its record through geological time. Emphasis of the course is on the evolution of life as determined from the evidence of the fossil record.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)

subject: EARTH
